summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Church Attendance Control System. All core functionality working correctly including authentication, CRUD operations for members/visitors, attendance tracking, reports generation, and dashboard statistics.

design_issues.issue: Missing accessibility descriptions for dialog components
design_issues.details: Console warnings about missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent components

passed_tests: Authentication: User registration and login with JWT tokens
Members CRUD: Create, read, update, delete operations
Visitors CRUD: Create, read, update, delete operations
Attendance tracking: Mark attendance by date for members and visitors
Dashboard statistics: Display total members, visitors, today's and monthly attendance
Reports generation: Date range reports and collective reports with charts
Navigation: All menu links working correctly
Search functionality: Member and visitor search working
Data persistence: All data properly saved and retrieved
UI responsiveness: Clean, professional interface with proper Spanish localization

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (All core functionality working, minor accessibility warnings only)
